mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory( item, received_date, price, quantity, updated_id, updated_datetime ) VALUES( #{item}, #{receivedDate}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{updatedId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, item, DATE_FORMAT(received_date,'%d/%m/%Y') AS receivedDate, quantity, price FROM inventory

SELECT i.id, i.item, (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN stock_in = TRUE THEN quantity ELSE (quantity * -1) END) FROM stock WHERE inventory_id = i.id) AS quantity, i.price
FROM inventory i
